thread.title: A Woman Cuts Off Her Pinky Finger And Then Boasts About It On Social Media
thread.title_full: A Woman Cuts Off Her Pinky Finger And Then Boasts About It On Social Media

author: Kunal Kumrawat
title: A Woman Cuts Off Her Pinky Finger And Then Boasts About It On Social Media
text:
IN People ON 24 Feb, 2017 A Woman Cuts Off Her Pinky Finger And Then Boasts About It On Social Media Share on twitter Follow Us On 
The world of social media, the virtual universe, it was created to 'connect the people around the world' who share the same interest, love same food and follow the same passion. But unfortunately, every coin has two sides, and even Mark Zuckerberg possibly didn't have thought of this outcome. 
A 30-year-old woman, Torz Reynolds has done something insanely that has shaken the very existence of social media, and their meaning might change in the near future. A Woman Cuts Off Her Pinky Finger And Then Boasts About It On Social Media 754 396 in People A-Woman-Cuts-Off-Her-Pinky-Finger Disturbing picture of woman who cuts off her pinky finger Torz, who is a body piercer & modification artist in the UK was feeling depressed for having no followers on Facebook. 
Not, only she did this, but she performed this act of disgust LIVE in front of her friends and followers. It indeed worked, and very soon like a wildfire, her followers increased in huge numbers. 
From a few of her friends following her for the sake of friendship, her followers increased to more than 14,000 from all around the world. Torz Reynolds kept on posting these pictures online, and media persons became even more interested. 
Today, many of the mainstream media agencies have already reported this act of violence. Did she perform the act of self-harm only to get more followers on Facebook? And the answer is, Yes! Is she suffering from a disorder? Well, maybe. 
Either this lady has body honour identity disorder, or she was truly unhappy with the tattooed word on her pinky finger. A few weeks ago, when she decided to do it, she started counting down the days, and then she finally did it.
